university_info: Manage students and facilitate the quick validation of their academic status.
student_info: Find the perfect, safe home close to your university.
owner_info: List properties and connect with students validated by the university.
agency_info: Manage real estate listings and help students find a home.
already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign In
already_have_account_student: Already have an account? Sign In
hero_subtitle: The ideal partner for universities in managing student housing.
hero_list_item_1: We simplify the connection between the university and students.
hero_list_item_2: Manage the necessary files for rent aid.
hero_list_item_3: Digitized management of rent aid requests.
pricing_subtitle: The Annual Plan, ideal for short-term student management, and the Four-Year Plan, perfect for long-term integration with attractive financial benefits.
about_influence_students: How does the app impact students' lives and beyond?
about_platform_description: Rent4Students is a digital platform that simplifies the process of managing rent subsidy applications dedicated to students. Universities benefit from a centralized system for managing applications and documents, reducing bureaucracy and optimizing staff time.
about_transparency_efficiency: The platform promotes transparency and efficiency in the relationships between students, universities, and landlords, contributing to a modern and digitized management environment.
faq_question1_heading: How can a university add and manage faculties on the platform?
faq_question1_desc: Universities can use a dedicated form to add faculties along with the email addresses of secretaries who will handle student requests.
faq_question2_heading: What advantages does the Rent4Students platform bring to universities?
faq_question2_desc: The platform digitizes the management of rent subsidy applications, saving time and administrative resources, and offers a centralized and user-friendly environment.
faq_question3_heading: What subscription plans are available for universities?
faq_question3_desc: Rent4Students offers two options: an annual plan for full access for one year and a four-year plan, ideal for managing an entire university generation.
faq_question4_heading: How are students' requests and documents managed?
faq_question4_desc: Each faculty manages its own students through a centralized system, ensuring transparency and efficiency in processing rent aid applications.
faq_support_subtitle: If you have questions, contact us!
are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the faculty
email_body_part_1: We are excited to inform you that your Secretary account for the Rent4Students app has been successfully created! This account will allow you to manage students and access all the features of the app dedicated to your university.
email_instruction_step_1: Access the Rent4Students app at: [App URL].
email_instruction_step_2: Enter your username and temporary password.
email_instruction_step_3: We recommend changing your password immediately after first access to ensure account security.
email_contact: If you have any questions or face difficulties accessing the app, feel free to contact us at [Support Email] or [Support Phone Number].
email_closing: Thank you for your cooperation and good luck in managing the students!

welcome_students.invite_text: We invite you to complete a short set of questions. Your answers will help us provide personalized recommendations tailored to your lifestyle and preferences.
welcome_students.instruction_one: The completion process takes just a few minutes.
welcome_students.instruction_two: Answer truthfully for the best results.
welcome_students.complete_description: Choose this option to benefit from automated suggestions and matches based on your needs.
welcome_students.explore_description: Explore without completing the profile, but keep in mind that recommendations will not be personalized for you.
